entry.source: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153001}It has stopped at the boot screen.{F801}What should I do now...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153001}It has stopped at the boot screen.{F801}What should I do now...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153002}I explained this to you once before...{F801}You simply enter the password.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153002}I explained this to you once before...{F801}You simply enter the password.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The questioning monk bowed to Hugo{F801}and walked away.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The questioning monk bowed to Hugo{F801}and walked away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153003}Er... pardon me again...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153004}How do I enter "ぢ"?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153003}Er... pardon me again...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153004}How do I enter "ぢ"?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153005}"ぢ" is "D" and then "I", remember?{F801}How many times must I tell you...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153005}"ぢ" is "D" and then "I", remember?{F801}How many times must I tell you...?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The monk asking the questions bows to{F801}Hugo and leaves...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The monk asking the questions bows to{F801}Hugo and leaves...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153008}The PC that our Samurai recovered in{F801}Tokyo IS quite useful, but...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153009}Well, we have received orders to{F801}transcribe all of our scriptures{F801}into the PC.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,153008}The PC that our Samurai recovered in{F801}Tokyo IS quite useful, but...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153009}Well, we have received orders to{F801}transcribe all of our scriptures{F801}into the PC.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,153010}Our new leaders are quite a stern lot...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153011}None of us are accustomed to this {F801}process. And I could not even fathom{F801}how much scripture our records hold.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,1,1,1}{F813,0,153010}Our new leaders are quite a stern lot...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,153011}None of us are accustomed to this {F801}process. And I could not even fathom{F801}how much scripture our records hold.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153012}Would the new leaders have us labor{F801}day and night, without rest?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153012}Would the new leaders have us labor{F801}day and night, without rest?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153014}I did relay the message to you,{F801}did I not?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153014}I did relay the message to you,{F801}did I not?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153015}Go to Shene Duque! Else I shall be the{F801}one punished...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F87B,10,12,1,1}{F813,0,153015}Go to Shene Duque! Else I shall be the{F801}one punished...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153016}Uhh... I am dreadfully sorry to{F801}intrude, but...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Questioning monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,0,153016}Uhh... I am dreadfully sorry to{F801}intrude, but...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Hugo is barking answers to the monk's{F801}questions...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Hugo is barking answers to the monk's{F801}questions...{F801}
